name: multichain.js
description: Control accounts across multiple chains with NEAR Protocol

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsup --env.TARGET=node && tsup --env.TARGET=browser && npm run build:post
scripts.build:post: jq 'del(.scripts, .devDependencies) | .files = ["browser", "node", "package.json", "README.md", "LICENSE"] | .exports = {".":{"types":"./node/index.d.ts","browser":{"import":"./browser/index.browser.js","require":"./browser/index.browser.cjs"},"node":{"import":"./node/index.node.js","require":"./node/index.node.cjs"},"import":"./node/index.node.js","require":"./node/index.node.cjs","default":"./browser/index.browser.js"}} | .main = "./node/index.node.cjs" | .module = "./node/index.node.js" | .browser = "./browser/index.browser.js" | .types = "./node/index.d.ts"' package.json > dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/
scripts.publish-npm: npm run pre:deploy && cd dist && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-npm:beta: npm run pre:deploy && cd dist && npm publish --tag beta
